Reviews.Title: “Too many issues”
Reviews.Author: Kramerica
Reviews.Content: The location is very convenient, the price is right, but in the end you get what you pay for. We were in town for an athletic event and had 10 rooms reserved for 2 nights each. The hotel itself is quite large. There were several buildings, most of which seemed empty while we were there (red flag!). Assuming my room was typical, it wasn't much to speak of. It was fairly small and the decor was outdated. As mentioned in previous reviews, the choice of tv stations is pitiful. Maybe 15 stations total, and a poor choice of stations at that. The room appeared fairly clean, and it was adequate for a budget stay. However, in one of our other rooms we had a player who had a series of what appeared to be spider bites going up her side when she woke up in the morning. I asked the front desk if it could have been bedbugs and they said they were sure it was spiders. Either way, obviously unacceptable. They put the players in a different room and they did comp us for the original room. Another room had key cards that continually malfunctioned and would work once or twice and then were useless. On several different occasions we had to go get new keys. Finally, they put the players in that room into 2 separate new rooms and only charged for one. So the staff did try to accommodate us and address the issues, but these were things that never should have been issues in the first place. If I were to visit Branson on my own as part of a vacation or some other outing, I would not consider staying at this hotel again, unless I was on an extremely tight budget.

Reviews.Title: “Keep Looking”
Reviews.Author: Paul M
Reviews.Content: Service : Front desk and any other employee I ran into were all quite friendly and helpful but in no hurry to accomplish any task. After checking in we were leaving our room to go eat and the light bulb from the porch light came crashing down all over the walk way being concern of my safety & others called front desk 3 times that evening to clean the broken glass up but never happen till I told a maid that next morning myself kudos to her! Rooms: Out of date but clean beside the ants crawling on the walls. If you watch tv your out of luck very bad service package no local channels and the televisions are about 20 yrs old. Bathroom I saw larger ones in RVs very small. The beds need updated not very comfortable. And for some reason we were put on the second floor for a complex that had six buildings and were not even close to being fully booked. My advise for the price they want you would be much happier to stay away from here and keep looking . Good Luck and be safe !

Reviews.Title: “not a good value and Foreclosed Location,”
Reviews.Author: MissouriReviews
Reviews.Content: this unit has been foreclosed. there is no Internet on backside of the hotel. prices for value is not equal. days inn is suppose to have a good breakfast but this place does not have anything they are suppose too. the beds are horrible. check in takes over 30 minutes. staff not knowledgeable about room types they have. you will not get a good value here

Reviews.Title: “No no no!”
Reviews.Author: Gary M
Reviews.Content: Do yourself a favor and speed up if you see this place. It is over-priced. It has the absolute worst tv package in the country. The room had an odor. the staff, however, was friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Exhausting”
Reviews.Author: Terryryan
Reviews.Content: This hotel had the absolute worst bed I've ever slept on in my life. Our 3 night stay was a great time except for the pile of bricks we had to sleep on. At one point we literally thought about going to the local walmart and buying a memory foam pad. Other than that the room was clean, staff friendly, and and ok location. If you're big on comfort-this ain't it folks.

Reviews.Title: “Economy hotel...adequate location”
Reviews.Author: estith
Reviews.Content: For the price, the rooms were ok but definitely not fancy. Our two rooms looked a little older but were clean, and it was fairly quiet. We never made it into the complimentary breakfast, because the area was full to overflowing every time we tried. But the Plantation Restaurant close by had a great brunch at a very reasonable price! We probably will choose a different motel next time. It was Christmas time and there were no others available that weekend.

Reviews.Title: “Average hotel in a good area of Branson”
Reviews.Author: huskertravelers
Reviews.Content: If you are just looking for a economy hotel in a decent location in Branson then this would be ok. The rooms were average, ours (we had 2) were clean. everything was a little outdated but looks like the pool was recently renovated. Complimentary breakfast was very light. Probably would look for something a little better for the price though.

Reviews.Title: “Take Our Word For It!”
Reviews.Author: nettnut
Reviews.Content: I think they fired all of the maids! Room was nasty. Hairs in the tub, drains wouldn't drain, key card would not work, mold in the grout of the shower stall, room had a offensive odor. Breakfast was nothing more than some old bananas. We had made reservations for 3 nights but left after 1. This was over Thanksgiving weekend and we were very lucky to find another hotel. DON'T STAY HERE!

Reviews.Title: “Don't bother”
Reviews.Author: Thomas S
Reviews.Content: It's a cheap motel, but even for a cheap motel, don't waste your money. The only thing it has going for it is, the employees are very nice. TV is abysmal, no ESPN and even worse, no local stations to get news and weather. Beds were lumpy, shower wouldn't drain and smelled musty in the room. Take a tent, wouldn't be much worse.

Reviews.Title: “Very average!”
Reviews.Author: beccaboo2001
Reviews.Content: When we first got the hotel, all they had available for our reservations was a smoking room King bed or a non-smoking room 2 queens. I really wanted to go with the non-smoking but my fiance and I rarely spend time together so we thought "what the hay". The staff said it probably wouldn't be very smoky. Boy were they wrong! Not only that, the bed was hard as a rock! I've never slept in something that hard. The next day we switched and they had a king-sized bed non-smoking room. This was better, still had a funky smell but the bed was much better and more pleasant. The continental breakfast is what it is. Nothing but cereal/cheap donuts/toast. We pricelined the hotel and are hoping that we don't get stuck with it again!

Reviews.Title: “Decent place for a decent price”
Reviews.Author: tous2819
Reviews.Content: I was pretty happy with the price I got online from this hotel. When we got there, we discovered a very basic room that would be drafty in the winter (literally about a one inch gap under the door!), but that worked well for our late summer trip. The staff was polite but not overly friendly, and the breakfast was pretty typical these days - make-'em-yourself waffles, two types of cereal, doughnuts, and some fruit with coffee, juice, and milk to drink. Overall, we didn't have any complaints and we would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Worst experience ever”
Reviews.Author: zowie007
Reviews.Content: The room we were first put in smelled , when we asked to be moved they moved us into another room that also smelled. My husband checked the bed and the mattress had holes in it. it was raining and we didn't really want to move again so we put up with it. When we checked my bed it was also full of holes and also had something that looked like blood on it. When we went in to the office the staff were very rude and had an attitude that they didn't care it really didn't seem to be a big deal. the mattress was so old you could hear the springs squeak and we both had a horrible time sleeping.

Reviews.Title: “Extremely Basic and Uncomfortable”
Reviews.Author: Gail A
Reviews.Content: Admittedly, I accidentally booked this hotel by mistake so I walked in with high expectations lingering from hotel I thought I had booked. But with all that aside you get what you pay for. I personally was in the Standard Two Beds with some girlfriends. Like most Branson hotels unfortunately this one was very basic and not anything special, but if money is the main concern then this will do just fine. -Pros: Great price, good location, friendly staff and nice, basic breakfast with biscuits and gravy/ waffles. -Cons: Outdated rooms, smaller rooms, no extras like microwave/fridge, hard to control the temperature in the room, only modestly clean, extremely uncomfortable beds

Reviews.Title: “Recent Stay in Branson - Days Inn”
Reviews.Author: Nana2Callie
Reviews.Content: This was our first stay at the Days Inn though we visit Branson often. We were very pleased with our room, the exceptional service we received from the front desk and the hot breakfast really did include hot food and a nice selection. We will stay here again - very centrally located and easy access.

Reviews.Title: “A Disgusting place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: L E
Reviews.Content: This was the most disgusting motel I have ever stayed at. We booked this motel 2 months in advance thru Branson Marketing, they said it was a great place to stay. That was a joke, we checked in on September 17th, when we woke up the next morning there were thousands of ants everywhere, on the walls, floors, bathroom. We went to the office and they said they new building 2 had had ant problems all summer so they would move us to a different building (my question was why did they put us in there to begin with) they didn't have the 3 major networks and didn't know when they would get them. The mattresses were old and dirty, the carpets are filthy and breakfast was gross. I would discourage anyone from staying there, also if you get sucked in the 90 min meeting, it is a travel agency that goes from $11,000. down to $1,000 according to how many no's you say.

Reviews.Title: “Clean- Very Comfy Beds & Pillows”
Reviews.Author: Cooperde4
Reviews.Content: We did not make our reservations in advance. The Front Desk personnel was very accommodating as we were traveling with our grown son & two dogs. The room was very clean, & the shower had nice water pressure. The beds were very comfortable w/ 4 fluffy pillows per bed. The continental breakfast was sparse, toast or doughnuts, orange juice or apple juice and coffee. They explained in their off season, they scale back the breakfast & host it in their dining area. When they run at full capacity, they open up the restaurant below, and serve a wider variety of fruit & the waffles. Which we were o.k. with, we usually go out for a full breakfast at a local restaurant anyway. We thought for the money, we had a bargain!!! Will return if we are in the area.

Reviews.Title: “poor quality but we only paid 25.00 on travelocity”
Reviews.Author: lordsgift
Reviews.Content: so I graded it poor for the condition of the property. I do feel we paid about what it was worth, so I dont' have any complaints. Folks, get to breakfast early, before 8am if you want to get in there. I went at 7:30 and had no problems. I went back later with a child, and there was a a waffle line to the front door, and that was a long line, and they had three waffle machines going. This is a really big complex with a lot of people staying here. It is run down. But our room was clean and cool, and the staff is very professional and friendly. For the price i would stay here again no hesitations. My iron and iron board were present in my rooms.

Reviews.Title: “Terrible!”
Reviews.Author: ConnieKPilotGrove
Reviews.Content: Our room was reserved by a visitor center. We were not very pleased with the room because of the dirty carpets and shappy furniture but were willing to try and make it work. We unloaded our bags and headed out for the evening. When we returned we showered and put on our bed clothes to retire. While my husband was talking on his phone I saw something moving on the nightstand. I thought it looked like a tick and then I flipped the mattress and OMG!!!!!!!!!!! Bugs everywhere!!! I called the front desk in a panic and was told to get out of there and come to the desk and they would put us in another room. We loaded up and moved to a different room in a different building. This room was just as dirty but I didn't see any bugs. We reshowered and I washed our clothes. The beds are in terrible shape at this hotel as are the sheets and blankets. The housekeepers didn't tuck the sheets in or even try to smooth them out. The floor wasn't vacuumed and no shampoo was left. The tv flashed a bright light which would make you dizzy. The breakfast was terrible(cold cereal, little donuts, and waffles that you had to stand in line for an hour for). No one bother to ask how our second room was or if we needed anything. I really thing the Day's Inn chain needs to check this property. Some of the rooms may be okay, but there are a lot of them that are not. Won't see me staying there again!

Reviews.Title: “Great Value with Exceptional Customer Service”
Reviews.Author: LRK98
Reviews.Content: My husband and I enjoyed a few vacation days in Branson to see some shows and relax. The hotel was very clean, an excellent price, handy location and a nice pool area. Check-in was seamless and the front desk help was very informative. I would certainly stay here again and will encourage others visiting to take advantage of this value.

Reviews.Title: “Good value”
Reviews.Author: WashingtonLoulou
Reviews.Content: We booked our room on Priceline, certainly got our monies worth, this is a big Days Inn and has a large pool and serves an okay breakfast- nothing special, but considering the cost, I can't complain. Branson has a lot to offer and it's good to know that you don't have to go broke staying at a hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Worst Ever!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Suzy027
Reviews.Content: We arrived on motorcycles and it was 108 degrees outside. First thing is we wanted an ice cold pop so we went to get ice....and the machine was broke. I walked to the next building and got ice and at the same time was going to get a beverage out of the pop machine. Needless to say it ate my money and gave me nothing. Went to take a shower and by the time I was done the water was almost over flowing because the drain was plugged. My husband still needed to take a shower so I called the front desk to tell them about the ice machine, pop machine and the plugged drain. There response was, "I will put it on the maintenance man's list, but it might be awhile. Needless to say we are still waiting for the maintenance guy so that we can finish getting showered and go out. DON'T STAY HERE, IT IS A DUMP!

Reviews.Title: “Okay place with some glitches”
Reviews.Author: Marckd1976
Reviews.Content: I always liked Days Inn Motels and Hotels - This one seemed fine - Visit started out poorly - Room Keys did not work and opened someone else's room...That situation was corrected and then I was missing a refrigerator which was ordered with my room. Also internet reception was very poor. The safe also did not work right. Also the walk to the pool was quite long. TV selection was also mediocre - some local channels but not great reception. On the positive note - Motel Keys were corrected immediately. Also the next day a refrigerator was added. The safe was also recided to work right. So overall the place was okay - nothing great - I do applaud the staff correcting most of the problems - The internet reception though was poor. So my two big pet peeves - TV Channel selection - TVs are obsolete - and - poor internet reception... Its unlikely I will return - next time around I will try Best Western, sister chain Super 8, or maybe a local indie that has good reviews...Maybe even one of the water park resorts. Next time I will try something different. Was not overly impressed.

Reviews.Title: “Terrible, would not recommend to anyone.”
Reviews.Author: cesry
Reviews.Content: When we arrived the room was not cleaned, there were dirty pillows on the bed and the pillows had no cases on them. There were absolutely no towels or wash cloths in the room. When we first found this out was when we had a family member who just took a shower and asked for a towel. We called the front desk to report and it took them over 10 minutes to bring towels. My family member was frustrated over this and went to the front desk. So they gave us another room. Well guess what, when we got in the room there again were no towels or wash clothes or pillowcases on the pillows. We then decided to get our money back and go to another motel. We will never stay at a Days Inn again!

Reviews.Title: “Won't be back!”
Reviews.Author: KStravelerHarper
Reviews.Content: This is a very large hotel spread out over several buildings with a very long distance between the buildings and the office. Our first room on the third floor we were given was filthy - beds not made, dirty towels, hide-a-bed in middle of floor - so we hauled everything back down and drove back to main office. Clerk apologized but I don't think would have believed me except I took photos of the room. Wanted to talk to supervisor, but he was out on the grounds and had not taken his phone with him. This time I requested a room on the ground floor and closer - was told none were available. So we are given another room again in the farthest location and one the third floor. This time after hauling everything up again, we can't even get in the door. Only one key even acted like it will work by lighting up - but the door would not open. So again we pack everything back up and drive back to the office. This time the manager is there. So we are given a third room - and surprise - this room is closer and on the main floor. At this point we're tired and even though the carpet is noticeably stained we stay in the room. We later figured out that the room was for guest with pets - now know where the stains are from. The bed was very uncomfortable and sagged considerably on one side. Room had ants had crawling the walls. Oh and only one of the two key cards would work. Don't plan on eating breakfast. All it is donuts, waffles, cold cereal. We got there early before 8 and pretty much all of the donuts were gone and long line trying to make waffles. Breakfast was in the main office location with not enough room to accommodate the number of rooms it was trying to serve. We would not have stayed but hotel was part of a package deal. Wish I would have read more reviews than the one on the package page – which was very inaccurate and most possibly paid for by the chain or the website. This was our first trip to Branson - sure didn't leave a very good first impression and we won’t be back

Reviews.Title: “2 Star..good for saving money....(Sometimes)”
Reviews.Author: RENOROX
Reviews.Content: Had a 3 night stay via Hotwire...they got the star value correct!..contienental breakfast was nothing but donuts juice waffles toast cereal. Grounds were not well kept...5 or 6 buildings made up the property ..just not as nice as mom and pop chains ..do your research!

Reviews.Title: “Great value! We'll be back!”
Reviews.Author: shadykt21
Reviews.Content: We chose this hotel at the last minute because we wanted a reservation before arriving. The price was inexpensive and we didn't know exactly what to expect, but we were pleasantly surprised! This is an older hotel and is showing its age, however it is very, very clean! PROS: Inexpensive price Clean Great location only one block off the strip but still close to everything Nice pool Excellent customer service (the safe in my room malfunctioned with my purse and jewelry inside - service desk had a maintenence person in my room in 5 minutes to unlock it!) CONS: Older, needs remodel and update We stayed in the main building, but the people in building 4 had a long walk to breakfast or the pool Pool needs more chairs - it gets crowded Overall, it was a wonderful stay and we will definitely be returning!

Reviews.Title: “Nice room good location”
Reviews.Author: jungl70
Reviews.Content: Got the room for $29 a night on hotwire. So for that price thought it is a great place. Has a nice pool and does have a breakfast. The breakfast is waffles, donuts, cereal, bagels, toast, juice, and milk. All we do is usually sleep in the room so it was clean and the air was cold, good enough for us. Would go back again for the deal.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly Suprised”
Reviews.Author: birdamundo
Reviews.Content: We didn't have a reservation for this hotel but found a great coupon in a a travelers directory so decided to give it a try. The hotel was not the newest but was very nice. The staff was very friendly and the location can not be beat. We will most definitly stay at this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Wouldn't stay here again”
Reviews.Author: jcb2282
Reviews.Content: I checked in and went to my room. The toilet was filled with diarrehea. So, I went to the front desk to get a new room. The desk staff was nice about it, but when the housekeeping manager who was also at the desk found out she just said she had been too busy to double check that all the rooms were clean. The room they moved me to had a lipstick mark on the back of the toilet seat and the shower wouldn't work. The pool was nice, but only 1 out of the 3 hot tubs were working. They had waffles, doughnuts, and cereal for breakfast. I have stayed at other similar priced hotels that offer more hot items. I stayed here because I got a good deal on priceline. I would not stay here again, especially for full price!

Reviews.Title: “We loved our stay and how convenient this location is!”
Reviews.Author: skzfskzf
Reviews.Content: We loved our stay at the Days Inn Branson. We were warmly greeted when we arrived and it only took a few minutes for us to check into our room. After unpacking, since we were planning on staying for several days, we went back to lobby to look at the brochures before we went to do a little shopping. Once again we received much help from the desk clerk. She gave us a map and showed us how we could avoid much of the traffic on Hwy. 76 by using the Branson Time Saver Routes. The Days Inn is located by the yellow route making it very easy to bypass the congested Hwy. 76 and get to our destination easily whether it was one of the outlet malls or one of the many shows that are available in Branson. The decor for our room was typical, two beds and a television. It wasn't fancy but had everything we needed to enjoy our stay. The room was clean and the cleaning staff did an excellent job each day in making sure the room was always clean when we returned. Each morning we went down to the breakfast area to eat. The complimentary breakfast provided a large selection to choose from. We especially enjoyed making our waffles each morning. There was also ample tables and chairs so that we never felt overcrowded as we ate our meal. It was a great way to start the day. We will definitely stay at the Days Inn Branson the next time we visit Branson. What we liked best was the price and the location. It was affordable which allowed us to have more of our money for having fun while we were there. The only thing that we did not like was being on the second floor and having to walk up the stairs. Next time I will ask for a ground floor room.

Reviews.Title: “It was ok - pool was nice!!”
Reviews.Author: spinegirly
Reviews.Content: Upon arrival they gave us a smoking room and it stunk so bad. We then asked to have a non-smoking room. When i went back to the front desk to ask to be moved I was informed kinda huffily that I would have to be moved to another building farther away. I stated I didn't care what building I was in but that it be smoke free and not stink! The exterior of the building looked like some of it had rotted away in places. It could use some repair. I thought the room and bathroom was a little small but average I guess. It was clean - however the vent over the shower had lots of fuzz in it. The pool was great. One small for little kids and a large one. Two hottubs but only 1 was working. Breakfast the next morning was continental with cereal, donuts and waffle machine. I pricelined this hotel for cheap but no way would I have paid full price. But fior what I spent it was good!

Reviews.Title: “Days Inn is centrally located!”
Reviews.Author: DBauer01
Reviews.Content: We liked the fact that we were in the middle of everything and were able to go anywhere quickly. The hotel was clean and the staff (Miss Ann) was very friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!!”
Reviews.Author: slj639
Reviews.Content: We had 3 in our group (and 2 small dogs). The staff was amazing! We could not have asked for nicer people to look after us during our stay. It was quiet and very clean. Everyone was very helpful. You just shouldn't pass this place up. When we come back to the area, we will stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “the best staff i have ever been around”
Reviews.Author: ggjjbigpop
Reviews.Content: We stayed 3 nights here and i was glad we did the staff was great anytime day or night. I will be staying here when i come back. We go to Branson around 3to4 time a year.

Reviews.Title: “surprised.....”
Reviews.Author: smith041
Reviews.Content: For two years of no choice because i wanted to get rewards we stayed in this hotel.first time we checked in, rooms are still dirty and they move us to another rooms with dusty smells and left over trash still at trash can.2nd time we checked in sheets w/ stain and towels from previous guest still hang in the bathroom and carpet not properly vacuum.We decided to change hotel this time and book to Howard Johnson no LUCK we were back to DAys Inn due of something they called WEATHER INTERRUPTION.Kids are not happy,we check in anyway,nobody wants to check rooms and EVERYONE saying what do we have this time?Positive mind alone and check..............SURPRISED............SMELLS FRESH AND ABSOLUTELY CLEAN ROOMS.KIDS STILL NOT SATISFIED AND KEPT LOOKING FOR SOMETHING AND AMAZINGLY DID NOT FOUND ANY THING TO COMPLAIN AND ALL OF THEM SAYING MAYBE THEY GET RID OF THEM AND PLACE A NEW ONE.WHO EVER NEEDS TO GIVE CREDITS FOR THIS WE SALUTE YOU ROOMS ARE WAY DIFFERENT FROM LAST YEARS.GREAT JOB AND KEEP THEM FOREVER....

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay at Branson”
Reviews.Author: dubs37
Reviews.Content: On other trips we stayed at the Days Inn. Being a Days Inn is also located in Branson, we booked it through the Wyndham Rewards and received a great rate. Our stay was for 3 days. The room was very clean and cheerful. The bed was very comfortable, sheet were cleans , my wife really enjoyed the pillows, to get a great rest. The continental breakfast has a good variety of food to start the day. The management and office staff were very friendly and helpful. The cleaning staff do a great job of cleaning the rooms. The location is great. I would recommend the Days Inn to everyone that come to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “never stay there again-moved there by HOJO sister hotel”
Reviews.Author: dsjkdj
Reviews.Content: Rotting exterior, TV worked part time, bathroom fan was horribly noisy-could not hear the TV when the fan was on. There was no place to sit our suitcase without sitting the coffee pot in the floor. charged for a room safe per night???? towels were so thin your couldn't dry with them. The room smelled. We had a pet with us and she was in more danger of getting dirty from the room than the room getting dirty from her. We were moved there from their sister HOJO hotel that had cable and Internet problems. They did not inform us prior to our arrival and we had no chance to make other arrangements. Very diappointed in this hotel and the hotel group for their handling of the situation.

Reviews.Title: “nice room, bad service and use..”
Reviews.Author: britt09
Reviews.Content: i stayed in the Days Inn, for spring break with a friend.. we picked this hotel because it was so close to the strip and the things we wanted to do, well online it said that there was heat/AC, WIFI, and cable TV... well, neither of those worked, we walked to the lobby where the guy said that he would re-set the router... we never heard back from him, and the internet still did not work, we go to turn our AC on, and it to, does not work, so we call up, they said that they will send someone to come look at it, they never showed up.. so were laying in out beds.. and we go to watch TV... THE TV DOESNT WORK!!!!!! i will NOT stay at this hotel again, and i hope that people will see this, and call ahead to make sure that everything is working before they stay at this Days Inn... also, make sure you go out for breakfast if you are hungry... they only have Waffles, and Donuts for breakfast.. and cerel if yoru lucky..... >:(

Reviews.Title: “Good Mid-Range Motel”
Reviews.Author: cswroe
Reviews.Content: It is a good mid-range hotel. The building itself has some design issues (Can hear water running from other rooms, gap around entry door, etc), but the rooms were very clean. We had a total of three rooms that we were able to get at an excellent deal on priceline, and there were no complaints. There were some minor issues like one coffee cup and condiments for only one cup, TV reception was going in and out as it lost satellite signal, but overall, was a nice stay. Wireless internet seems to be working great, we saw some reviews that caused some concern about the facility, but you can tell that they are and have been making improvements. This facility allows pets as one of our rooms was next to someone who thought they could just leave their dog in there all day and it would not bark....but it did. Don't expect lots of frills and a "like new" feel, after all, you are in Branson, go outside and enjoy!

Reviews.Title: “Great for a quick weekend trip”
Reviews.Author: krh002
Reviews.Content: Good location which was right off of Hwy 76. It was an ok place to stay. I wouldn't rate it too high but if you're looking for a motel to stay at just to basically use for sleep and showering then it's good for that. The continental breakfast was good. It had waffles, doughnuts, coffee, juice, cereal and fruit.

Reviews.Title: “Felt like I was in a time warp...”
Reviews.Author: DisneyQueen18
Reviews.Content: This motel was a blast from the past. The room was like the stripped down rooms that were commonly found in the 70's. The beds were very lumpy and the springs could be felt through the mattress. The carpet looked and smelled dirty and the bathroom was tiny with a lot of mold growing in the shower. I could not stay in this room. I was so creeped out by this room, I would rather have slept in my car. Luckily I found a room with the Marriott down the street for the same price. Steer clear of this motel if cleanliness is important to you. The management was accommodating as we were shown several rooms. Unfortunately, all of them had issues.

Reviews.Title: “Motel not bad but needs improvements”
Reviews.Author: skbkjb
Reviews.Content: The motel was better than I had expected but needs some improvements. The room was very clean and the beds weren't bad, they were comfortable. It was a very quiet place to stay you didn't hear alot of noises. The problems I had with the motel were the remote didn't work which was a little inconvienient (I could have walked to the desk but too tired and it was a little walk). The door had a crack about an inch and even when locked you could still see through it. I finally put a chair against it to hold it. The breakfast wasn't very good, fruit consisted of an apple. Then there was toast, muffins, oatmeal, cereal, donuts and waffles. Coffee was very weak (I don't like it strong but this was too weak). They didn't leave creamer, sugar or stir straws in the room for the coffee maker. Anyway, the motel was clean and comfortable and for the price it was worth it.

Reviews.Title: “Great time, great value”
Reviews.Author: rmaner
Reviews.Content: We have 3 young children and all of them enjoyed both the kiddie pool and the larger pool. A crib was quickly brought to our room when we discovered it had not been set up in advance. The crib was very dated, but adequate enough for our quick 1 night stay. We will stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “A great, clean, comfortable, facility with extremely pleasant staff and managers.”
Reviews.Author: mdnkl
Reviews.Content: This is a great hotel to stay at while in Branson. The room is clean and comfortable. Always feeling very fresh. The beds are great, this coming from people with back problems! Very comfortable. We use a handicap accessible room and it meets all of our needs. The room is adequate in size for our family of 4. With so much to do in Branson we are happy with the convenience of location and a good place to sleep and rest at night. We have stayed there 8 times this summer for 2-3 days each. They also offer a great continental breakfast with waffels ! Will be back again in mid November for the Christmas festivities in Branson and Silver DollarCity ! Donna and family !

Reviews.Title: “Bed bugs 6212”
Reviews.Author: donald004
Reviews.Content: Stayed there late September 2010. Was bitten by bed bugs all over my legs and arms. I at first thought they were mosquito bites but woke up with new bites in the morning which is how the little nasty things operate. Stayed in room 6212. After checking out and telling the check-out clerk, I called and e-mailed the manager with photos and a letter. The manager said he would get back with me. He has not. Will never stay in a Days Inn again. I have photos of the bites on my body. I actually took my own comforter and pillow with me from home because I had heard about this problem in hotels. They came up out of the frame or the sheet that I slept on. Be warned!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Will stay again.”
Reviews.Author: sherrytrustinHim
Reviews.Content: Very good location. Close to everything. The staff was very friend and helpful. The room was clean. The bed was comfortable. The breakfast was good. We stayed 3 nights. We were well pleased overall.

Reviews.Title: “This is the best motel we have found in Branson!”
Reviews.Author: alvalarmstrong
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at several hotels in Branson, & this is the best one for comfort & value we have found! We will be staying there again many times & will recomend this one to our family & friends.

Reviews.Title: “Don't stay here”
Reviews.Author: brobin51
Reviews.Content: it was 98degrees outside and in the room a/c didn't work, toilet kept running till i took the chain off, bathtub took about two hours to drain after i took a shower

Reviews.Title: “go someplace else!!”
Reviews.Author: snoopy789
Reviews.Content: I cannot think of one good thing to say, we did change rooms b/c our AC didn't work and it was 100 degrees the day we were there. the 2nd room was a little better but I would never stay here again. The one guy at the front desk seemed bothered by us when we were checking in and when the vending machine stole our money he really seemed annoyed. I read several reviews before we went some were good, some were bad and now I see why. Our 1st room was small, dirty, the ceilings were so low that I could almost touch them and I am only 5'3. The TV was about a 13" and didn't have good color and made a buzzing sound. Since the AC didn't work they moved us...it was a step above the other room but still not great. We found empty soda bottles, candy wraps under the beds (not a big deal I know but they should clean under them) the TV still made a buzzing sound, room had a funny smell and was kind of dirty. I dont know what is up with this hotel, the difference between the two rooms was like night and day but i can say I would never stay again. Spend the extra and go someplace else.

Reviews.Title: “Not bad, once we had working AC.”
Reviews.Author: zimmpr
Reviews.Content: Check-in was fast & easy. Friendly staff. Only problem was AC in room did not work when we got there. Reported it. Was told it would be fixed by the time we got back from dinner. It wasn't, but they offered us the room next door, which solved the problem, albeit slightly inconvenient having to move all our stuff. Better than sweating! Room was clean. Beds were comfy. Slept well. Quiet. Pool area nice. Wi-fi worked well. Breakfast was in the mexican restraunt next door. It wasn't too impressive. Had better breakfasts, but for the price, not a bad place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “great stay”
Reviews.Author: huntinhillbille
Reviews.Content: this is a very clean and nice place to stay and my wife and i will make it your place to stay when in branson

Reviews.Title: “Should not have listened to Trip Advisor Comments!”
Reviews.Author: Susan75972
Reviews.Content: I am not sure where the positive comments posted on this website came from. We arrived in Branson on a Sunday afternoon went to hotel to check in and this took almost an hour. Airconditioning did not work in lobby temp was 91 degrees, this should have been my first sign of things to come. Got two connecting rooms as we have children 15 and 11 years old! We had our reservations for about two weeks before arriving. We were going to be in Branson for 6 days and 5 nights. Finally got checked in had to take nonsmoking rooms even after requesting smoking. Got to the rooms and unloaded all our belongings we noticed the rooms were hot but the airconditioning had not been turned on yet! To our surprise one of the rooms never cooled down. All the comments about TV reception and WiFi not working correctly are true! Got ready for bed later that night noticed there were only two other cars parked outside of the building we were staying in, this seemed strange! Got in bed and noticed crack around door, husband got up and placed a bath towel in a crack down the side of the door in hopes that this would keep bugs out and cool air in! The floors seemed dirty and we would not let the children walk bare footed on them! Made it through the night! Woke up the next morning after very little sleep and the rooms were still not cool! Later that day we moved to the Howard Johnson which I would recommend to anyone! Sorry but the truth is we didn't experience any of the positive things that others have said about this property! Later in the week as we discussed with others we met we were told that we should have not considered this property of our stay in Branson!

Reviews.Title: “ok for if your not going to be in your room much!”
Reviews.Author: mamamosley1
Reviews.Content: We stayed just one night here and weren't planning on staying in the room much anyways. I reserved this room through a travel company at a discounted rate or else I would have been really upset for the actual rate they charge. For what we paid it was ok, for what they typically charge I would expect more. The TV was nothing but static, the water faucet sounded like it was going to blow up and the ice machine was in pieces. The beds slept ok and had clean linens. Thankfully all we really needed was the beds! Oh yes, my husband says the A/C works great!

Reviews.Title: “Great lodging”
Reviews.Author: Fencecoach
Reviews.Content: The service was very good with comfortable beds and rooms.. The location, on the yellow route, is very handy for Silver Dollar City, outlet malls and to the restraunts in Branson,Mo. We stay at Days Inn between 2 and 5 times a year and have always had the best accomidations for the price in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “A pleasant experience”
Reviews.Author: cowgirlblue
Reviews.Content: We've stayed at this hotel many times and have always enjoyed our stay. The rooms are are always clean and the help very friendly. Have recommend them to our friends.

Reviews.Title: “Probably the best motel experience, facilities and staff, we've had!”
Reviews.Author: drummer74
Reviews.Content: As a retired professional, we travel a great deal, coast to coast. The staff here was the most pleasant we have encountered...courteous, cheerful and helpful. Rooms are smaller, but more than adequate (and I am handicapped), Facilities were in excellent condition and the best repair. Plenty of parking with easy access to rooms. This is a stop we will make on a regular basis!

Reviews.Title: “My experience at Days Inn exceed my expectations in every way.”
Reviews.Author: claudiaABlack
Reviews.Content: I appreciated the courteous staff. They were professional,knowledgable, and more than happy to accomidate me and my family. Roscoe, my pet yorkie gives Days Inn 2 paws up! The continental breakfast had a good variety of food, just what we needed to start our day of exploring Branson. The pool and hot tub was not open at the time(it was to early in the season, April) but looked pretty nice. Our room was nice and clean, it was good sized also. The bed was comfortable and we woke up well rested, due to the quiet atmosphere. It is a good sized hotel and convienently located one block away from the main strip. When we travel to Branson , Days Inn will be our home away from home.

Reviews.Title: “Another Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: tade74
Reviews.Content: We come up about once a month to Branson and stay in the Days Inn and always have a good experience. The staff is super friendly and while your not going to get a penthouse, you get a good, clean room for the price. The location is good and they have waffles in the morning.

Reviews.Title: “If you want cheap ....well its cheap..”
Reviews.Author: cj7jeeps
Reviews.Content: We spent 2 nights our of a paid for 3 night stay in this hotel. As long as you don't mind not getting any reception worth watching on tv, rooms that just feel dirty and wi fi only available if you are in the lobby then this is the place for you. When I say rooms I mean rooms, we switched rooms the first night when the tv wouldn't get any reception. The second room was better for television reception but still lacked in over all cleanliness the same as the first room. Also the beds are not very comfortable. I would personally not recommend this place to anyone I know. It was un-impressive enough for us to leave before spending the 3rd night there.

Reviews.Title: “A friendly and enjoyable stay.”
Reviews.Author: SmilyCatoosa
Reviews.Content: The rooms were clean and comfortable. The staff was friendly and helpful, if you had any problems. It depends on you as an individual on how your stay will be.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel from Hell”
Reviews.Author: lanelson1964
Reviews.Content: I wouldn't recomend this Hotel to anyone. The room was not very clean, the shower didn't drain, the trash can out side of our room had food that fell out of it and was left there for two days. Don't even want to tell you how dirty it was under the beds. The hot tub was dirty. The Manager was very rude to a customer that had some complaints. The best part was the pool and it was just ok. We could have stayed at a cheep Hotel on the strip and been just as happy. We checked out early just to get out of there. We will never stay there again even if its the last Hotel in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “fun economical place .”
Reviews.Author: megha1234
Reviews.Content: the days inn hotel is very conviniently located on the yellow route.it is close to tanger outlet ,white waters and many shows. there are many eateries close by.the rooms are clean and comfortable. the best feature is the swimming pool.the clidrens lay area and the hot tub. the griveances i have are 1)the breakfast is so so.to top it it took almost 25 min in the queue to get my breakfast and by the time i could get it rest everything had been removed . many people with kids went back without having anything to eat. the hostess was very rude.(looks like on a tight budget too.) 2)the house keeping was nice on the 1st day . but on the second day had forgotten to leave us any toileteries. did not realise till i neede a shower and was too tired to go the front desk and for some.as my rooom was wayyyyyyy back in the last block. apart fom this i had a un time at the pool and the hot tub. but i would like to request the managent to pls manage the chaos at the breakfast . andif possible improve the the quantity and quality of the breakfast .and be a little more considerate to towasds the guests

Reviews.Title: “Outdated, hard beds”
Reviews.Author: jlbounds1427
Reviews.Content: This hotel is outdated. It was nice in the lobby area, but our rooms were very outdated and had an odor. The beds were too hard because my husband has back problems. On the other hand, they take pets, they are close to 76, quiet and friendly. Since the room it most important, I will probably not stay here again

Reviews.Title: “Seemed Like A Nice Place To Stay...”
Reviews.Author: emmylou34
Reviews.Content: Our stay at the Days Inn was not a pleasurable one. The Front desk staff was very friendly and helpful. The room is another story. The beds were only double size (only thing available) and they were very hard. My husband spent half the night on the floor because the bed was to small. Then we woke up to ants everywhere. Our whole room had been infested by ants. It was horrible. The dresser, vanity, and nightstand all had ants everywhere. Of all the places we have traveled to and stayed at we have never had an expeirience like this.

Reviews.Title: “worst motel we ever stayed in.”
Reviews.Author: bpsew
Reviews.Content: The first room we were put in had the worst smell. It smelled as if animals were left in the room for days on end. The second room was better. Until we went to the bathroom. The stool was so loose that we thought it was going to fall off the floor. We will never stay there again.The cheapest motel in Branson is better than this Days Inn. Thanks but no Thanks Bryan Seward

Reviews.Title: “My Teenager said she had the best time ever!”
Reviews.Author: penny7119
Reviews.Content: We went and sent 2 night for my daughters 15th birthday at Days. It was the July 4th weekend. Our room and service were excellant, We also really enjoyed the pool area. I t was just a wonderful time all the way around. We spent most of our 2 days at the hotel itself.

Reviews.Title: “Rooms are very nice and good housekeeping”
Reviews.Author: oklahomatravelers
Reviews.Content: sinks are outside of bathroom in room, makes it nice with more than one person is staying, two can be getting ready at same time. housekeeping does not bother things. Have stayed here many times and keep coming back.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding management, great location, clean rooms, comfortable beds...”
Reviews.Author: sunshinesmiles1954
Reviews.Content: I have and will continue to recommend this hotel to my friends and family.. it has very clean rooms,the beds are very comfortable, the management and staff are excellent !...it's in a great location...I have stayed in many other hotels in branson, but my last 2 visits I have stayed here, I wont stay anywhere else ,and I look forward to staying there again soon..

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: cussler04
Reviews.Content: Front desk service above average and very helpful ,rooms are always ready and clean at check-in,and location makes it easy to get around very easy. Have rooms that are smoker and non smoker friendlyand are pet friendly which is the main reason for staying.will be staying again this summer.

Reviews.Title: “We would stay again”
Reviews.Author: Korky131
Reviews.Content: Stayed two nights and it was very good. Walked to alot of a Branson features and easy access by car to the others. Room was very clean and neat, made the trip enjoyable. Front desk and lobby is very neat and clean with friendly and helpfull staff. We would stay there again and we are already planning what to see the next time !!

Reviews.Title: “We'll be back”
Reviews.Author: TravelWithOurDog
Reviews.Content: I am disabled and the facilities here were very wheelchair friendly. Excellent accomodations in the room and especially in the restroom. We also travel with our dog, so Days Inn pet-friendly policy is very important to us. The room was clean and neat, and the staff was friendly and was quick to offer assistance when we needed. We will definately return to this hotel next time we travel to this area.

Reviews.Title: “A very nice and pretty place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: trudy0049
Reviews.Content: Love the location ,it is a real good place to take your family,and friend's! Really enjoyed the staff,food, and would have loved to stay longer but we did'nt have time too! Look forward to staying there more, soon I hope.

Reviews.Title: “Great experience”
Reviews.Author: Kendallj
Reviews.Content: Located on the yellow route. Convenient to shows. Near Stonehill winery. Overall, great location. Friendly staff. Discounted rated on Memorial Day weekend. Great vacation.

Reviews.Title: “It was a very convenient and affordable place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: ebayseller
Reviews.Content: It was very affordable compared to others in the area. They have a breakfast with hot waffles, which is a big help when it comes to vacationing on a budget. The location of the motel is very convenient. I loved the location and price.

Reviews.Title: “Centrally located, inexpensive jewel!”
Reviews.Author: JGordon617
Reviews.Content: Our first ever trip to Branson, I booked this Days Inn on the internet and received a very good rate. The hotel was easy to find, just off the strip, and check-in was quick and efficient. The staff provided me a very good map of Branson, listing all the attractions and businesses I wanted to visit, and explaining the alternate traffic routes in order to avoid the gridlock on the strip. Free Wi-Fi is available, and for those of us without a laptop, the lobby has several working computers where you can check your e-mail and stay connected. Our first floor, non-smoking room had two double beds, television with a working remote, and even a channel guide! The website had said the hotel was recently renovated, and all of the room appointments were excellent. The air conditioning worked, there was plenty of hot water, and the ice machine was only four doors down...and...it had ice in it!! You may laugh, but that in itself is a rarity, no matter what class of hotel you frequent! There is a nice outdoor pool with three hot tubs. Our FREE continental breakfast was served in the Mexican restaurant, next to the pool complex. Breakfast featured a make-your-own waffle bar, a large assortment of pastries, cold cereal, juice, milk, coffee...and...a nice attendant to bus the tables and keep the bar stocked! We were very pleased with this hotel and will make it our home during our next trip to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “We had a great stay”
Reviews.Author: Madelyn51
Reviews.Content: We had a great experience at the Days Inn. From the time we checked in to the time we checked out. The staff was very friendly and helpful. We will be making the Days Inn the only hotel that we will be staying at whenever we go to Branson. The breakfast was more than we expected. The front desk was very helpful in many ways.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Acomodations”
Reviews.Author: Rick S
Reviews.Content: Enjoyed the motel, people, help,and accommodations. Would recommend to others. Good location, nice surroundings... good value for the buck

Reviews.Title: “warning don't stay here”
Reviews.Author: justme6696
Reviews.Content: We checked in for a 3 night stay at Days Inn. I have to tell you that my wife, daughter and i were disgusted. for starters the room smelled like mold, the bathroom was filthy, and the sheets were dirty. we went and bought air freshner and asked for clean sheets. later after check in we wanted to go swimming, however, after walking to the pool we found it to be filthy with scum all across the bottom and looked like worms at the bottom of the deep end. and the 3 hot tubs were dirty as well. we have stayed in days inns before and never had this type of experience, just thought you should know how disgusted we were during our stay. we may now put days inn at the bottom of our list of places to stay and let our friends know as well. sincerely, unhappy customer.

Reviews.Title: “special,as we with lovely friends”
Reviews.Author: jbritishtraveller
Reviews.Content: Our room was spacious,air conditioned,clean,and well located,we stayed with our friends,the Mexican restaurant has wonderful food,the Pool nice,The area was full of entertainment,really liked the Titanic exhibition,and the Showboat is absolutely glorious and within easy reach of Days inn

Reviews.Title: “just ok”
Reviews.Author: polliwogArkansas
Reviews.Content: Service at the front desk was good. The roooms were small and were not very well kept. The furniture was old, the carpet was not clean, at first our room smelled so bad we asked for another. They did move us to a different room. There are much better and newer hotels in Branson for less money. Too pricey for what you get. I will not stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Disgusting Hotel”
Reviews.Author: taxbite
Reviews.Content: We were booked into this hotel through the French Quarter resort promotion deal. We did not stay. When we got into the hotel the room was very small, and smelled like pee. We went somewhere else. Will never do business with the French Quarter people either, if this is what they call a 4-5 star hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Terrible hotel and no customer service”
Reviews.Author: valMissouri
Reviews.Content: this place is horrible.....starting with the night manager. We were told they had 2 outdoor hottubs and 1 indoor. When we got there we found out they were all outdoor but they were still open even though it was October. It was a nice day so we thought we would go ahead and check in because the night manager told us that they were working and we wanted to relax for a while. We got to our room and went across to the hottub/pool area and only 1 hottub was even uncovered and had very little water, which I believe was rain water in the very bottom and probably 12 inches full of leaves. We were only an hour from home and we just came to spend the night and relax were (we believed) there was a indoor hottub or pool. I spoke to the manager, after he finally finished smoking out the front door of the lobby and he said he would just not charge us if we wanted to leave, but would not discount the room at all. I explained to him I had already paid through hotels.com and asked him to call and work it out. He gave me a phone number to them to call myself and it was the wrong number, so I had to call home and get the number myself to call and work everything out. They called the hotel directly and he lied to the operator and said that I was just upset because there was "a few leaves" in the hottub. He never mentioned NO WATER. We just came home and hotels.com refunded our money and I told them I would send pictures of the hottub so they would not the TRUTH. VERY RUDE CUSTOMER SERVICE.

Reviews.Title: “Be carefull with this location.”
Reviews.Author: davidcraine
Reviews.Content: Huge place. Below average rooms for a Days Inn. Mexican resturant next door for the contential breakfast is not big enough for 400+ rooms to get breakfast in a 2 hour time frame.

Reviews.Title: “Will not stay here again”
Reviews.Author: tjmac12
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Days Inn for 3 nights; booked thru Sunterra resorts. The room was VERY small and not very clean. Smelled like the carpet had been wet and not dried out good. Asked for queen beds and got doubles. Breakfast was your typical continental donuts and cereal. Maid service cleaned somewhat, just don't look under the beds! We had four people in the room and never received enough towels or washcloths for 3 nights. Walls are very thin and the floor shakes when you walk across it. The rail on the stairs shook when you grabbed it; couldn't lean on it without fear of it falling! Asked for a non-smoking room and the comforters had cigarette burns on them. All in all, I would not recommend this hotel to anyone. We will definitely not stay there again!

Reviews.Title: “Don't Waste Your Money”
Reviews.Author: countrygirl26
Reviews.Content: This hotel was definitely not worth the money we paid for it. First of all, the bathtub took about 15 minutes to drain, the sink faucet would not stop dripping, and the most annoying of it all was the air conditioner. It ran just fine until we laid down for bed. It would run for 1 minute and then shut off for 1 minute. It did this continually until I shut if off. The pool area was pretty nice but could have been repainted and cleaned. Only 1 of the 3 hot tubs was actually hot. The pictures on the website for Days Inn looks very nice but don't be deceived! I will never stay here again. It is only worth about half the price of what i paid for it.

Reviews.Title: “a nightmare”
Reviews.Author: topper52722
Reviews.Content: No Maid Service for our two nites stay - wireless internet connection was inoperable - they were aware of this from the first day and took no action to get this resolved. Our room was not ready - two towels and one bar of soap for four people - no washcloths - no ashtrays - no rollaway all of which had been stipulated in the reservations. We could barely fit our suitcases through the pathway to our room due to rows upon rows of wooden clothes racks where people were hanging their laundry. I picked a Days Inn due to wonderful experiences I have always had at this chain of motels - this one was a total dump !

Reviews.Title: “Loved the Pool complex”
Reviews.Author: Jenswin
Reviews.Content: When checked in the staff was very courteous. I loved the pool area. My room was clean, and the continental breakfast was wonderful. Over all my stay was great, with no complaints.

Reviews.Title: “Not at all impressed”
Reviews.Author: kswank
Reviews.Content: When we arrived the front desk clerk was very courtious. As soon as we got to the room though it was down hill from there. It was a non-smoking room that smelt like some one had smoked in it before. The HOTEL site we booked through listed this a s four star hotel, it is about a 2 star. The room is very small. The wife and I went to Branson for the first time and wanted to go with out my three children to scope it out. I have to say this room would not have accomidated the three kids and us very well at all. The bathroom is VERY basic and VERY small also. The cable TV only had about 4 channels you could actually watch, the rest were so bad you could not watch a program. In fact the SPANISH channel was the clearest out of all of them...too bad I can not understand spanish though. No HBO or premium channels at all. The pool was ordinary, but ok. The three hot tubs they advertise was down to 1 and it had alot of cracked or missing tiles on it. The best part of the stay was leaving as they had very frech donuts on the way out for thier breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Left Early--Hotel was not welcoming”
Reviews.Author: mbaops
Reviews.Content: Walls were very thin. Could not get a good night sleep because of a family with small children next door. When toilets or showers were run in the rooms next to ours, it sounded like Niagara Falls! Also, the free continental breakfast was meager and only consisted of apples, toast and cereal. In addition, the hostess was not very friendly and turned us away at 9:25 saying that she had to begin shutting down at 9:30.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful staff and room!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Totally remodeled room. Arched shower curtain, coffee maker, shampoo, VERY clean, quiet, comfortable, beautiful grounds, breakfast, everything in the room worked, efficient, friendly front desk staff. Would stay here again in a heartbeat! Moved from an intolerable situation in another motel in the same area to this one for the remainder of my stay in Branson. The front desk staff gave me the key and let me check out the room prior to renting it..It was like a slice of heaven when I first opened the door. GREAT job, Days Inn!

Reviews.Title: “Love the Outdoor Whirlpools”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: The prices are very reasonable and I loved sitting in the outdoor whirlpool in the coolness of October. The rooms are clean , small but very nice. I have been staying here 3 or 4 times a year for the last 12 years. They keep your name in their computer and I just call and make a reservation in less than a minute. The location is one of the best, a block off the main strip. The front desk has always helped with all my needs, extra towels, directions, portable beds. The free continental breakfast is very good with lots of donuts, cereals, coffees, juices. I would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Sorriest Place in town”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I was part of a military reunion held at the Days Inn. Nothing they promised was delivered, some rooms had no hot water. For one example, a single household grill was provided to accommodate a cook-out of over 100 persons - a disaster. The promised hospitality room was a tent in 90 degree weather filled with flies, I could go on, but no member of our reunion group, the 10th Infantry divsion will ever go there again

Reviews.Title: “Quiet pleasant stay”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: This was our third trip to Branson, and (honestly) not our first choice in hotels. We usually stay in one of two small hotel on the strip but they were both booked. I made reservatiions online. Checkin was extremely smooth. Our room (in building 4) was clean and adequately stocked with towels, coffee, and cups. The room was quiet despite the place being filled almost to capacity. The walk to the pool was a bit of exercise - but I didn't wanted to save money. We didn't partake of the continental breakfast either morning, but we did use the nearby mexican restaurant. The walk to 76 was not bad since the hotel is just a block away.

Reviews.Title: “We'll be back.”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We arrived in Branson around 1:00PM and had pets. We were hoping to be able to check in before 3PM. I had booked a room on the internet. When I walked in the lobby, I was waited on by a very courteous young lady. She pulled my reservation card in a matter of seconds and started working away in her computer. When she learned we had brought pets, she changed our room assignment and this did not seem to bother her at all. In a matter of minutes we were on our way to our room. This young lady gave us a map of the complex and directions to our room. She carefully explained things and answered my questions without hesitation. We understand with pets you probably don't get the best rooms, but we were pleased with the room assignment. The room had an ironing board and iron, as well as a hair dryer and coffee pot and coffee. Right across the parking lot was a nice little "grass area" for our pets to run around. While walking our pets, every time an employee would drive by in a cart they would smile and acknowlege us. The continental breakfast was very pleasant. A rather large facility is used with plenty of room and food available. We are frequent visitors to Branson, and will not have to think twice about returning to this motel.

Reviews.Title: “Stay away at all costs”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: When I walked in to check in, the guy working behind the desk, was on the phone, so I walked over to the girl who was working. I heard him say something like, yeah I think he just walked in, but didn't think anything of it. I told the girl my name and that I was checking in. Once I gave her my name, I heard him say "hold on just a minute" He turned to me and said "Are you Randy?" To which I responded yes. he said "You have a phone call". When I took the phone, there is nothing but silence on the other end. Thats when he started laughing and said ah I am just playing with you. The girl waiting on me said the room assigned to me would not be ready until 3:00. I was understanding, because housekeeping was not finished for the day. I had reserved a queen room and had asked if the room was somewhat close to the pool, because I knew my oldest son would want to swim. I was told that it was not, but that there was a room very close to the pool, but it was only a full size room. We opted to stay with the Queen room. Our plans were to go to Silver Dollar City, but we did not want to leave our items in the car until 7:00 when we finished our day. So we did some shopping while we waited. We returned at 3:00 and got our room on the second floor in Building #4. We grabbed all of our stuff, made it upstairs with the boys and opened our door to find the room not cleaned. I called the front desk and they told me housekeeping had finished for the day. They told me that I could come back to the front desk and they would get me a different room. I once again asked if they could get me closer to the pool, they offered the same rooms as before. I told them that was alright. So, we grabbed all of our suitcases loaded them and the kids back up in the van, drove back to the office to get our new room. When I arrived, The guy who pulled the phone prank on me informed me I was now in building 6 on the fourth floor. The building farthest away as possible. I said "You have to be kidding" I was told that was all they had available. I was not happy at all. I expressed my dissatisfaction and was told that was all they could do. I took the key and started to walk out. I decided to ask if I was required to stay there, since my room was not ready and I was pushed so far down. When I turned around both clerks (the guy who waited on me and an older lady) were snickering and shaking their heads at each other. This further infuriated me, but I kept my cool. I asked if I was required to stay and was told I was not. We went to our room, (seeing maids still cleaning other buildings along the way), drug the kids and our luggage to the fourth floor and unpacked in a room with beds that had as much spring as antique beds and a toilet that kept running. We discussed leaving and going to another hotel. But it was already 3:30 and Silver Dollar City was closing at 7, so we decided to stick it out. We went to SDC and returned later that night, to find only 4 cars (including our own) at building 6. Building 4 where we were originally had 4 cars as well. The buildings closer to the lobby were more full, but it was obvious there were PLENTY of empty rooms throughout the complex. The next night there were 6 cars at our building and a few more throughout the complex, but once again, plenty of empty rooms. I complained to Days Inn Customer Service 3 times before this motel responded. Once they did, they argued with me &informed me that it was their decision, nothing had happened innappropriate, but they talked to their staff. I finally did get a $20 refund from Days Inn Corporate... Oh boy, I can take the family out for burgers now!

Reviews.Title: “Never again.....”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: This was the first hotel that we ever stayed in in Branson, but never again. The first room that they put us in was totally out of date, smelled old and musty. Nasty carpet. When turning back the bed, we noticed the linens had not been changed from the previous nights guest. They did give us another room that seemed to be a little newer, but still not what I considered to be a nice room. They really need to refurbish parts of thier hotel.

HotelInfo.Name: Days Inn Branson
HotelInfo.Address: 3524 Keeter Street, Branson, MO 65616
